  • Uses of ThreadContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.requestheader

    Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.requestheader that implement ThreadContextListener
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    RequestHeaderThreadContextListener
    Implementation of ThreadContextListener that ensures the correct initialization of the RequestHeaderContainer when working with non-container managed threads on all supported Cloud platforms.

  • Uses of ThreadContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security

    Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security that implement ThreadContextListener
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AuthTokenThreadContextListener
    Implementation of ThreadContextListener that ensures the correct initialization of AuthTokens when working with non-container managed threads on all supported Cloud platforms.
    class 
    BasicAuthenticationThreadContextListener
    ThreadContextListener implementation reading the Basic Authentication Header from the incoming request and storing it in the current ThreadContext.
